LanguageData.MURWallLight_LampSettingsDesc: These settings apply to the vanilla Wall Lamp.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_LightRadDesc: How far the light radiates from the wall lamp. Default: 11
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SteelCostDesc: How much steel a single wall lamp costs to build. Default: 15
LanguageData.MURWallLight_PowerCostDesc: How much power a single wall lamp consumes. Default: 30
LanguageData.MURWallLight_DisableTargetDesc: If enabled, enemies will not actively target wall lamps.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunLampSettingsDesc: These settings apply to the Wall Sun Lamp added by this mod.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_EnableSunDesc: If this is checked the Wall Sun Lamp will be available for construction.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunLightRadDesc: The range that will be considered brightly lit and allow plants to grow. Default: 7
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunSteelCostDesc: How much steel a single sun light costs to build. Default: 30
LanguageData.MURWallLight_SunPowerCostDesc: How much power a single sun light consumes while active. Default: 1600
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertReload: Please save and load the game for the changes to take effect.
LanguageData.MURWallLight_AlertRestart: Please restart Rimworld for the changes to take effect.
